name: Tiny Tales: 2D Character Generator
description:
Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: 2D Character Generator, you will have a powerful tool to custom generate your own character sprites!

Features
  • Several body types, skin tones, hairs, ears and accessories!
  • Varied collection of clothing and options for helm/cloak sync!
  • Auto generate several sprites in one go, or export one by one!
  • Preview of sprite in-engine!
License Information
  • You cannot claim ownership of the assets (copyright/IP).
  • Assets can be used both in free and commercial games.
  • Assets can be modified freely to fit the needs of your game.
  • Redistribution and reselling of the asset files or derivatives as is without permission is strictly forbidden.
